abstract: What’s a search deal with Microsoft worth to Yahoo’s shareholders? With rumors flying, analysts at Bernstein Research ran some numbers, even as they expressed skepticism that a deal will become reality.
snippet: What’s a search deal with Microsoft worth to Yahoo’s shareholders? With rumors flying, analysts at Bernstein Research ran some numbers, even as they expressed skepticism that a deal will become reality.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo reports its earnings on Tuesday, but that’s not what Wall Street and Silicon Valley are buzzing about.

headline.main: What’s a Web Search Deal Worth?
